About

Remain Off is a quiet space for visual storytelling. No captions. No commentary. Just images — grouped by mood, memory, and light.

Created by Maino, a visual artist who regularly travels throughout Asia and can often be found wandering the streets of Hong Kong. This site is a slow archive of passing moments, shot mostly on film.

New collections are added monthly. You’re welcome to explore, reflect, or simply linger.

You can follow along on Instagram (@mc88xx).
